summary: This is a small retext of the Draugr texture color. It gives the Draugr a more \"Hellish\" look. Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
v1.0.1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{4/12/12} 
 - Female Draugr textures will be uploaded within the next day! (Sorry I am stupid and forgot)
 - LATEST VERSION released today (v1.0.1)! This includes the females in the main file as well!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a small retext of the Draugr texture color. It gives the Draugr a more \"Hellish\" look. 
1024x1024

Enjoy.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

author: VarCryne
